product_name: lucy Novelty Race Me Bra - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: When you need plenty of support and generous breathability for vigorous activities, the lucy Novelty Race Me Bra answers the call with a compressive fit and pullover style. 4-way stretch polyester/Lycra(R) spandex microfiber jersey takes moisture from your skin and moves it to the outside surface for quick evaporation. Full mesh racerback provides plenty of ventilation. Molded foam cups offer support, coverage and shape. Wide elastic band with hook-and-eye closure ensures the lucy Novelty Race Me bra fits comfortably. Closeout.
short_description: When you need plenty of support and generous breathability for vigorous activities, the lucy Novelty Race Me Bra answers the call with a compressive fit and pullover style.
